function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on wearables for remote assessment of covid-19 patients may overlook other critical symptoms or conditions that require in-person evaluation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks associated with the transmission and storage of sensitive health data from wearables to cloud-based platforms.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost of systems makes them less affordable to the public, limiting access to healthcare technology.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regulatory approvals and medical device clearance processes may delay the implementation of healthcare technology.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited availability of multimodal sensing systems for covid-19 symptoms hinders comprehensive disease monitoring and prevention.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sharing of temperature data with mobile app via bluetooth can lead to unauthorized access of sensitive health information.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices may not be accurate, leading to incorrect temperature readings and potential misdiagnosis or improper treatment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of pulse oximeter sensors at non-standard locations or with inaccurate sensors can lead to false readings and misinterpretation of oxygen saturation levels.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of wearable pulse oximeter devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of respiratory rate monitoring for disease evaluation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cough and lung sound monitoring for contagious disease symptoms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring dry cough for covid-19 detection and prevention.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Traditional ecg monitoring systems may increase staff-to-patient contact, leading to potential cross-infections.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cuff-based blood pressure monitoring by medical staff increases their work load and the possibility of them becoming infected.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous and remote monitoring of bp is essential for covid-19-positive patients to prevent sudden events and reduce cross-contamination.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obstacles exist in achieving accurate bp estimations, especially when tracking responses to medications, due to the dynamic nature and variability of bp in different individuals.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Aggregate data from wearables contributing to improved public health responses.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai and deep learning for covid-19 diagnosis and prevention.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forecasting pandemic spread using ai and data analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Smartwatch data collection and heuristic model used for disease detection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of ai in medical research and social context during pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Machine learning prediction of infection and severity risk for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of infection through wearable technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for outcome prediction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on remote monitoring and data transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Failure of healthcare systems due to resource mismanagement","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate access to healthcare facilities leading to increased travel for diagnosis and testing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of efficient data and application accessibility for healthcare management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to proximity of edge and fog computing to iot devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and training on hygiene and sanitation protocols for edge and fog computing infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on cloud and iot for data processing and communication in edge and fog computing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through wearable devices and environmental sensors in the home hospitalization system.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education about the use of iot-based devices and mobile applications in the context of contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing cost-effective sensing units for low-income patients.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable sensors may not accurately detect airborne pathogens, leading to false sense of security.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate privacy measures for sharing covid-19 electronic medical records cemrs could result in breaches and misuse of sensitive information.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of outdoor environment occupancy and density may lead to ineffective crowd management and disease transmission control.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of validation for system used for early diagnosis of covid-19 in students","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient focus on post-covid-19-infection effects on patients","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying on incomplete symptom screening for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of empirical studies evaluating the effectiveness of digital contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate tools for contact tracing and social distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on mental health due to the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clinical staff using pulse oximeters can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly sanitized between uses.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using consumer-grade wearables to measure students’ anxiety and depression may lead to data privacy and security risks.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in e-learning and use of iot in smart learning increases the risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of shared wearable devices and smart technology in educational settings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential barriers to wearables’ usage in healthcare due to prototype stages and user acceptance, security, ethics, and big data concerns.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited validation studies for wearables at the clinical level","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
